branchCategory.name: LECPMJ, Step Motor Controller, CC-Link Direct Input Type for LEHF Series
branchCategory.description: The LECPMJ is a controller for LEâ€™s 24VDC step motors, compatible with CC-Link v1.10 fieldbus. Fieldbus compatibility permits position and speed monitoring by the PLC, as well as step data entry. Up to 42 controllers can be connected, depending on the parameter definition mode desired at the PLC. Up to 64 motion control step data can also be set by laptop software or a teaching pendant.
branchCategory.bullets: <UL> <LI>Rewrite 1, 6, or all 12 step data items from PLC touch panel (CC-Link v1.10 compliant) <LI>Monitor position and speed from PLC touch panel <LI>Compatible motor: 24VDC step motor with incremental A/B phase encoder <LI>NPN or PNP parallel I/O types <LI>Screw or DIN rail mounting <LI>Configuration software required (sold separately)</LI></UL>

breadCrumb.name: LECPMJ, Step Motor Controller, CC-Link Direct Input Type for LEHF Series
